content:
Dear [fullName],

We would like to invite you to join the CITIIS Management Platform. To register please click on the following link. The link is valid for [linkExpire] hours.

Please ignore this email if you think this is not intended for you.

Regards,
CMP Team
subject: Invitation from CITIIS Management

content:
Dear [fullName],

Your current role on the CITIIS Management Platform is replaced with [role]. Please log in to check the details.

Regards,
CMP Team
subject: [CMP] Role Replacement Notification

content:
Dear [fullName],

Thank you for registering with the CITIIS Management Platform.

You can login in using the following link.

In case of any issues, please contact cmp@niua.org.

Regards,
CMP Team
subject: Registration Confirmation for CITIIS Management Platform

content:
Dear [fullName],

This is a confirmation email on your recent login on CMP.

In case of any issues while using the platform, please contact cmp@niua.org.

Best Regards,
CMP Administrator
subject: [CMP] You've Logged in

content:
Dear [fullName],

You have updated your user profile on the CITIIS Management Platform

Best Regards,
CMP Administrator
subject: [CMP] Profile Updated

content:
Dear [fullName],

[otp] is the One Time Password (OTP) to update your Email ID on the CITIIS Management Platform.

Best Regards,
CMP Administrator
subject: [CMP] OTP to Update Email ID

content:
Dear [fullName],

[otp] is the One Time Password (OTP) to update your Mobile Number on CITIIS Management Platform.

Best Regards,
CMP Administrator
subject: [CMP] OTP to Update Mobile Number

content:
Dear [fullName],

Your CMP account has been deactivated.

In case of any issues, please contact cmp@niua.org.

Best Regards,
CMP Administrator
subject: [CMP] Updates on your User Account

content:
Hi [fullName],

You are invited by a user of CMP to collaborate on the document [documentName].

Click here to access it.

Please ignore if you think this is not intended for you.

Best Regards,

CMP Administrator
subject: [CMP] Invitation to Access a New Document

content:
Dear [fullName],

A new comment has been added to the document [documentName] on the CITIIS Management Platform. Please log in to check the details and latest updates.

Best Regards,
CMP Administrator
subject: [CMP] New Comment on your Document

content:
Dear [fullName],

Document [documentName] has been updated with a new [text]. You can click this link to access it.

Best Regards,
CMP Administrator
subject: [CMP] Document Update Notification

content:
Hi [fullName],

You have a tag suggestion on CMP.

You can click this link to view it.

Please ignore if you think this is not intended for you.

Best Regards,

CMP Administrator
subject: A Tag has been Suggested

content:
Dear [userName],

A tag you suggested has been approved. You can click this link to view the details.

Best Regards,
CMP Administrator
subject: [CMP] Tag Approval Notification

content:
Dear [userName],

A tag suggested by you has been rejected. You can click this link to view it.

Best Regards,
CMP Administrator
subject: [CMP] Tag Rejection Notification

content:
Dear [fullName],

A new task has been assigned to you by [creatorName] on the CITIIS Management Platform. Please log in to check the details and latest updates.

Best Regards,

CMP Administrator
subject: [CMP] New Task Assigned

content:
Dear [fullName],

The delivery date of the task [taskId] has been updated on CITIIS Management Platform. Please log on to check the latest updates.

Best Regards,

CMP Administrator
subject: [CMP] Task Due Date Updated

content:
Dear [fullName],

New tag is added to [taskId] on CITIIS Management Platform. Please log on to check the latest updates.

Best Regards,
CMP Administrator
subject: [CMP] New Tag Added to Task

content:
Dear [fullName],

You have received a new message on CMP.

Here is an excerpt. [content]

Click here to view the full message.


Best Regards,
CMP Administrator
subject: New Message on CMP | [subject] on [timestamp]

content:
Dear [fullName],

As requested by you, [otp] is the One Time Password (OTP) to update your Password on CITIIS Management Platform.

Best Regards,
CMP Administrator
subject: [CMP] OTP to Update Password

content:
Dear [fullName],

The password entered by you on CITIIS Management Platform is incorrect. Please click on Forgot Password on CMP's login page to reset your password, if you have a problem in accessing your account.

Best Regards,
CMP Administrator
subject: [CMP] Platform Access Error - Invalid Password

content:
Dear [fullName],

[documentName], is published on CITIIS Management Platform. You can click this link to access it.

Best Regards,
CMP Administrator
subject: [CMP] Document Published

content:
Dear [fullName],

[documentName], is unpublished from CITIIS Management Platform. You can click this link to access it.

Best Regards,
CMP Administrator
subject: [CMP] Update on your Published Document

content:
Dear [fullName],

The email address linked to your CMP user account is updated. The new email address is [newMail]. Please use the new email address to log on to CMP.

In case you have not changed it and are still getting this message, then please contact cmp@niua.org.

Best Regards,
CMP Administrator
subject: [CMP] Email ID Updated

content:
Dear [fullName],

The email address linked to your CMP user account is updated. The new email address is [newMail]. Please use the new email address to log on to CMP.

In case you have not changed it and are still getting this message, then please contact cmp@niua.org.

Best Regards,
CMP Administrator
subject: [CMP] Email ID Updated

content:
Dear [fullName],

[documentName] on CITIIS Management Platform, is replaced with a new document. You can click this link to access it.

Best Regards,
CMP Administrator
subject: [CMP] Document Replacement Notification

content:
Dear [fullName],

Status of the task [taskId] is updated on CITIIS Management Platform. Please log on to check the details.

Best Regards,
CMP Administrator
subject: [CMP] Status Updated for Task [taskId]

content:
Dear [fullName],

A new document is attached to the task [taskId] on CITIIS Management Platform. Please log on to check the details.

content:

Start Date of the task [taskId] is updated on CITIIS Management Platform. Please log on to check the latest updates.

content:
Dear [fullName],

As requested by you, [otp] is the One Time Password (OTP) to update your Password on CITIIS Management Platform.

Best Regards,
CMP Administrator

content:
Dear [fullName],

As updated on the CITIIS Management Platform, your Password has been updated.

Best Regards,
CMP Administrator
subject: [CMP] Password Updated

content:
Dear [fullName],

You are added to a project [projectName], on CITIIS Management Platform. Please ignore if you think this is not intended for you.

CMP Administrator

content:

Progress has been updated for the task [taskId] at project [projectName] on CITIIS Management Platform. Please log on to check the details.

CMP Administrator

content:

Phases are updated for the project [projectName] on CITIIS Management Platform. Please log on to check the details.
